quotes.quote: Everything is more glamorous when you do it in bed anyway.
You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
To carry care to bed is to sleep with a pack on your back.
Don't take tomorrow to bed with you.
Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.
People sleep peaceably in their beds at night only because rough men stand ready to do violence on their behalf.
Early to bed and early to rise probably indicates unskilled labor.
Getting out of bed in the morning is an act of false confidence.
A man would prefer to come home to an unmade bed and a happy woman than to a neatly made bed and an angry woman.
No one ever died from sleeping in an unmade bed.
The best thing about lying in bed late is that you learn to distinguish between first things and trivia, for whatever presses on you has to prove its importance before it makes you move.
A hospital bed is a parked taxi with the meter running.
Never go to bed with someone whose problems are greater than yours.
Only a fool would make the bed every day.
Those who hate to go to bed fear death; those who hate to get up fear life.
The bed is a metaphysical piece of furniture.
And bed, he thought. Bed is my friend. Just bed, he thought. Bed will be a great thing. It is easy when you are beaten, he thought. I never knew how easy it was. And what beat you, the thought.
O bed! O bed! delicious bed! That heaven upon earth to the weary head.
The bed is a bundle of paradoxes: we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret; we make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
Bed is the best place for reading, thinking, or doing nothing.
On the soft bed of luxury many kingdoms have expired.

The bed is just gorgeous. It's bright and colorful. It looks like a whole bunch of mattresses piled up. But it's an optical illusion. It's really just fabric, stuffing, nails and a staple gun. It's so tall, you need a ladder to get in.
A bed is where a sense of shared purpose first takes root.
The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
The bed is now as public as the dinner table and governed by the same rules of formal confrontation.
The bed comprehends our whole life, for we were born in it, we live in it, and we shall die in it
In bed we laugh, in bed we cry, and born in bed, in bed we die; the near approach a bed may show of human bliss to human woe.
Go to bed early and wake up early. The morning hours are good.
